# konsolephemeralcontainer
![konsoleephemeral.svg](icons/konsoleephemeral.svg){: style="height:64px;width:64px"}
## inherite from
[abcdesktopio/oc.template.alpine](../abcdesktopio/oc.template.alpine)
## abcdesktop release
main
## Platforms
linux/amd64,linux/arm64
## Distribution
alpine ![alpine](icons/alpine.svg){: style="height:32px;"}

``` 
NAME="Alpine Linux"
ID=alpine
VERSION_ID=3.18.2
PRETTY_NAME="Alpine Linux v3.18"
HOME_URL="https://alpinelinux.org/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="https://gitlab.alpinelinux.org/alpine/aports/-/issues"

```


## Alpine packages

``` 
konsole sudo
```

## Arguments
`"--name ephemeral_container"`

## Displayname


``` 
konsole [ephemeral_container]
```

## Path


``` 
/usr/bin/konsole
```

## ACL

``` json
{
    "permit": [
        "all"
    ]
}
```

## WM_CLASS

``` 
ephemeral_container.konsole
```

> The WM_CLASS property (of type STRING without control characters) contains two consecutive null-terminated strings. These specify the Instance and Class names to be used by both the client and the window manager for looking up resources for the application or as identifying information.
> to get the WM_CLASS property of an application, use the command line `wmctrl -lx`

## POST run command

> POST run command are run **after** the package install comman

```
ENV SHELL=/bin/bash
RUN echo "ALL ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL">/etc/sudoers.d/all
```



## JSON dump
json source file konsolephemeralcontainer.d.main.json 

``` json
{
    "acl": {
        "permit": [
            "all"
        ]
    },
    "cat": "development",
    "postruncommands": [
        "ENV SHELL=/bin/bash",
        "RUN echo \"ALL ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL\">/etc/sudoers.d/all"
    ],
    "icon": "konsoleephemeral.svg",
    "apkpackage": "konsole sudo",
    "keyword": "ksonsole,console,shell,bash,sh,ephemeral_container",
    "launch": "ephemeral_container.konsole",
    "name": "konsolephemeralcontainer",
    "displayname": "konsole [ephemeral_container]",
    "containerengine": "ephemeral_container",
    "args": "--name ephemeral_container",
    "path": "/usr/bin/konsole",
    "rules": {
        "homedir": {
            "default": true
        }
    },
    "template": "abcdesktopio/oc.template.alpine"
}
```

## Install the builded image
>Replace the **ABCHOST** var set to localhost by default to your own server ip address

``` sh
ABCHOST=localhost
curl --output konsolephemeralcontainer.d.main.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/main/konsolephemeralcontainer.d.main.json
curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: text/javascript' http://$ABCHOST:30443/API/manager/image -d @konsolephemeralcontainer.d.main.json

```

## Generated `DockerFile` source code

``` 
# Dynamic DockerFile application file for abcdesktop.io generated by https://github.com/abcdesktopio/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/make.js
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE BY HAND -- YOUR CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN
# Dockerfile konsolephemeralcontainer is generated at Wed Aug 02 2023 12:39:17 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
# platforms=linux/amd64,linux/arm64
#
ARG TAG=dev
FROM abcdesktopio/oc.template.alpine:$TAG
FROM abcdesktopio/oc.template.alpine:$TAG
USER root
RUN apk add --no-cache --update konsole sudo
LABEL oc.icon="konsoleephemeral.svg"
LABEL oc.icondata=""
LABEL oc.keyword="konsolephemeralcontainer,ksonsole,console,shell,bash,sh,ephemeral_container"
LABEL oc.cat="development"
LABEL oc.launch="ephemeral_container.konsole"
LABEL oc.template="abcdesktopio/oc.template.alpine"
ENV ARGS="--name ephemeral_container"
LABEL oc.name="konsolephemeralcontainer"
LABEL oc.displayname="konsole [ephemeral_container]"
LABEL oc.path="/usr/bin/konsole"
LABEL oc.type=app
LABEL oc.rules="{\"homedir\":{\"default\":true}}"
LABEL oc.acl="{\"permit\":[\"all\"]}"
ENV APPNAME "konsolephemeralcontainer"
ENV APPBIN "/usr/bin/konsole"
LABEL oc.args="--name ephemeral_container"
LABEL oc.containerengine="ephemeral_container"
ENV SHELL=/bin/bash
RUN echo "ALL ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL">/etc/sudoers.d/all
USER root
RUN mkdir -p /var/secrets/abcdesktop/localaccount
RUN for f in passwd shadow group gshadow ; do if [ -f /etc/$f ] ; then  cp /etc/$f /var/secrets/abcdesktop/localaccount; rm -f /etc/$f; ln -s /var/secrets/abcdesktop/localaccount/$f /etc/$f; fi; done
USER balloon
CMD [ "/composer/appli-docker-entrypoint.sh" ]

```

## Rebuild the image manually

### Download the Dockerfile manually
[Dockerfile for application konsolephemeralcontainer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/main/konsolephemeralcontainer.d)
``` sh
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/abcdesktopio/oc.apps/main/konsolephemeralcontainer.d
```

### build the `Dockerfile` to create a container image

``` sh
docker build --build-arg TAG=main -f konsolephemeralcontainer.d -t konsolephemeralcontainer .
```

### Install the new image
>If you are using `containerd` as container runtime, use the ctr command line

 
>If you are not running this bash command on your abcdesktop node
>Replace the **ABCHOST** variable set to localhost by default to your own server ip address


``` sh
ABCHOST=localhost
docker inspect konsolephemeralcontainer > konsolephemeralcontainer.json
docker image save konsolephemeralcontainer -o konsolephemeralcontainer.tar
ctr -n k8s.io images import konsolephemeralcontainer.tar
curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: text/javascript' http://$ABCHOST:30443/API/manager/image -d @konsolephemeralcontainer.json

```
